casebody.data:
No. 71028 Supreme Court of Nevada. JULY 20, 2018

NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, LLC; Bank of New York Mellon, f/k/a Bank of New York as Successor Trustee To JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., as Trustee for the Bear Stearns Alt-A Trust, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2004-12; and Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems, Inc., Appellants,
v.
MELVIN GROUP, LLC, Respondent.

AFFIRMED.
